action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: A bedroom with a double bed that has a black geometric headboard and white bedding. There are two white pillows on the bed. On either side of the bed are round glass-top nightstands with metal bases, each holding a table lamp with a cylindrical base and a white lampshade. Above the bed are three abstract paintings with black and red colors. The floor is wooden.

DESCRIPTION: A bedroom with a large wooden bed featuring an ornate headboard and footboard. The bed is covered with a patterned bedspread and multiple pillows. There are two matching wooden nightstands on either side of the bed, each with a lamp. A framed picture hangs on the wall to the right of the bed. The room has beige walls and carpet.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A bedroom with a double bed that has a black geometric headboard and white bedding. There are two white pillows on the bed. On either side of the bed are round glass-top nightstands with metal bases, each holding a table lamp with a cylindrical base and a white lampshade. Above the bed are three abstract paintings with black and red colors. The floor is wooden.

QUESTION: Is there any artwork or decoration on the wall above the bed in your image?
